name: Tomb Raider I

insert-disc.description: Insert the Tomb Raider bonus CD

content:
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/tomb-play.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert the Tomb Raider CD
    requires: TOMB.EXE
- task:
    commands:
    - 'C:'
    - CD TOMBRAID
    - TOMB.EXE
    drives:
      c: $GAMEDIR
      d: $DISC
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/tomb-play.conf
- task:
    commands:
    - 'D:'
    - INSTALL.BAT
    - exit
    drives:
      c: $GAMEDIR
      d: $DISC
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/tomb-install.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/tomb-install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert the Tomb Raider bonus CD
    requires: TOMBUB.EXE
- task:
    commands:
    - 'D:'
    - instr.bat
    - exit
    drives:
      c: $GAMEDIR
      d: $DISC
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/tomb-install-ub.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/tomb-install-ub.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
